overview:
Jeff is founder of JTI, Inc. a professional service firm focused since 1999 on international business strategy with emphasis on the technology sector.

Jeff’s experience in managing companies in the US and Europe ensures creative yet practical support to achieve business objectives. JTI supports foreign companies with the design and execution of US market entry plans, and US companies with their market entry and restructuring in Europe.

Jeff has also served as a trusted advisor to Board members of some of Germany’s largest companies. In this capacity he has addressed business strategy issues as well as sensitive communications, public and government affairs, and compliance matters.
